TEXT.TITLE: NATIONAL BEVERAGE TO ACQUIRE FAYGO BEVERAGES
TEXT.BODY:
<National Beverage Corp> said it agreed to acquire <Faygo Beverages Inc> for an undisclosed amount of cash. Faygo has revenues in excess of of 100 mln dlrs, National Beverage said.
Reuter
